mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id, subject, content, hit, register_time, bcode) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now(), #{bcode})
mapper.select: select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, b.bcode, u.user_name from board b join users u on b.user_id = u.user_id where b.article_no = #{articleNo}
